message:
CONVERSATION 1
Her: Next time we meet, I'm gonna grill her with questions.
Him: Yeah, hit her with that interrogation. Make sure she doesn't plead the fifth.

CONVERSATION 2
Her: I'll put her on the spot next time, watch me.
Him: Oh, going full detective mode? Remember, no cap in your questions.

CONVERSATION 3
Her: Next time, I'm asking her everything, no holding back.
Him: Bet, turn into the human lie detector. Just don't make her ghost us, lol.

CONVERSATION 4
Her: I'm gonna ask her the real questions, get ready.
Him: Sure, just don't scare her off. We need the tea, not a runaway.

CONVERSATION 5
Her: She won't know what hit her, I've got questions lined up.
Him: Fire away, but if she dips, you're playing 20 questions with me next. 😉
prompt:
I'm creating an AI bot designed to help teenage guys talk to girls. I need you to generate some conversations.

        Here is the sample conversation-

        Her : incredibly sagacious person. 
        Him : yes yes yes. totally.

        An example of a valid answers for this convesation would be-

        CONVERSATION 1
        Her : im super wise wtf
        Him : of course, Socrates ;)
        ,

        CONVERSATION 2
        Her : im so smart
        Him : does that mean that our children will be intelligent baby  ;)

        I emphasis this again - the messages from 'her' and 'him' must have the same theme as the prompt. They must be funny, witty and charming. They must be sexy and attractive. The conversations must be in Gen Z slang. lmao, lol, cringe and cap would be appreciated. Make them as sarcastic as possible.

        I need 5 conversations like this, with unique messages for her and him.

        Here is your prompt. 
        Her : Her : i shall ask her this the next time we meet.  
        Him : Him : yes. from my side also ask her. 

        Your Conversations must be of the format :
        CONVERSATION
        Her : 'message'
        Him : 'message'.

        I want just the conversations. No filler messages or content which AI usually gives.

        Thanks bro.
